say.label: I do not own any of the images or fonts that are used to create this tease.
You may only use this tease for personal use.
None of the items in this tease can be sold or redistributed for money.
If you are a copyright holder of any of the used resources and want them removed, feel free to contact me.
Every character is 18 years old or older.
This is a work of fiction.
Names, characters, businesses, places, events and incidents are either the products of the authorâ€™s imagination or used in a fictitious manner.
Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental.
Always consider your own safety first.
If the tease asks you to do anything you feel is unsafe or could threaten your health, don't do it.
Ensure your wellbeing is paramount at all times.
Game Length
By default the match count is 15.
More matches increase the games duration.
Hentai
Disable hentai to use real 3D humans.
CBT
Enable or disable tasks related to cbt.
Only CBT
When enabled only cbt related tasks are used.
This setting only works if cbt is enabled as well.
Difficulty
The difficulty of a game is determined by the AI-level.
Auto Play
Enabling auto play replaces the players manual decision with an automatic AI decision.
This enables the tease to be played "Hands Free".
Auto Play
